name: Live Preview – Product Options – Lite
author: sahumedia

sections.description:
Product Option Plugin For WooCommerce
★★★★★

With the product options from SAHU MEDIA ® you can implement text fields in products and receive a live preview of the product.

Try The Demo

Woocommerce offers you many opportunities to sell your products. Depending on the possibility, certain plugins for von Woocommerce personalized products also cost different. For example, there is the Woocommerce Product Customizer. With this you can create the visual appearance of your e-commerce products and adapt accordingly.

The SAHU MEDIA has a Plugin with live preview developed so that customers, for example Engraving products can see well what it might look like. The first benefit, clearly, a better completion rate.

WooCommerce text field live preview

The Woocommerce text field live preview is beneficial for the online shop. This enables you to see in advance what an engraving would look like on the relevant product. For example, there is a function on certain websites in which you can, for example, insert an engraving into a bracelet free of charge to see whether it meets your requirements.

Best Features

  • Easy Setup
    Easy to set up and available for single and variable products.

  • Up to 2 text fields
    Add up to two text fields in your product.

  • Special character
    Add another field in your products so your customers can add special characters.

  • Custom Fonts (PRO)
    Use your own fonts for example engraving.

  • Canvas Livepreview (PRO)
    The live canvas preview is included in the Pro version, you can get it here.
sections.faq:
Is there any documentation?

Currently only videos, you can find them here.

Do I need WooCommerce?

Yes WooCommerce is a requirement for the plugin.

The live preview does not work! What can I do?

Check if you have the PRO version. If not, it will probably be because of it. You can purchase it here. If you have the PRO version, please contact us.

Where can I report bugs?

Report bugs on the Forum pls. We will try to fix it as soon as possible.
